item.title: 法国商业信心在动荡的大选期间下滑
item.description: 法国企业的信心下滑到了自科维德大流行病以来从未有过的水平，因为企业要应对临时选举带来的动荡，这使法国陷入了不确定的政治未来。【原文：French business confidence slumped to levels not seen since the Covid pandemic as companies reckoned with the turbulence of snap elections that plunged the country toward an uncertain political future.】

item.title: 英美资源集团采取化肥减记措施，削减钻石目标
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在拒绝了必和必拓集团（BHP Group）的求购后，试图重塑其业务，因此进一步削减了现已停滞的化肥项目的成本，并下调了钻石前景计划。【原文：Anglo American Plc took a further writedown on its now stalled fertilizer project and cut planned diamond outlook as the miner tries to reshape its business after rebuffing an approach from BHP Group.】

item.title: 法航荷航下调运力预期以应对奥运会的更大冲击
item.description: 法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）下调了全年运力展望，原因是夏季奥运会期间游客避开巴黎造成的运力缺口大于预期，该集团已开始冻结招聘并进一步削减成本。【原文：Air France-KLM trimmed its full-year capacity outlook amid a bigger-than-expected shortfall from tourists avoiding Paris during the Summer Olympics, with the group initiating a hiring freeze and additional cost cuts.】

item.title: 联合利华扭亏为盈，季度销售额令人失望
item.description: 由于首席执行官海因-舒马赫（Hein Schumacher）的扭亏计划未能取得进展，联合利华公司第二季度的销售额增幅低于预期。【原文：Unilever Plc sales rose less than expected in the second quarter as Chief Executive Officer Hein Schumacher’s turnaround plan failed to gain ground.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司利润因油价下跌超预期
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）公布的第二季度利润降幅大于预期，原因是天然气价格下降和炼油利润下降超过了石油收益。【原文：TotalEnergies SE reported a bigger-than-expected drop in second-quarter profit as lower gas prices and weaker refining margins more than offset gains in oil.】

item.title: 英国 Centrica 公司扩大股票回购，为投资者带来利好
item.description: Centrica Plc 将扩大其向股东返还现金的计划，以寻求对英国基础设施投资（如 Sizewell C 核电站）的支持。【原文：Centrica Plc will extend its program to return cash to shareholders as it seeks to build support for infrastructure investments in the UK like the Sizewell C nuclear power station.】

item.title: 澳大利亚法院驳回拜耳公司 "Roundup "致癌指控
item.description: 澳大利亚一家法院驳回了关于拜耳公司除草剂Roundup会导致非霍奇金淋巴瘤这种癌症的指控，这打击了在澳大利亚就此提起集体诉讼的努力，尽管这家德国公司在美国面临着数千起类似的指控。【原文：An Australian court rejected claims that Bayer AG’s weedkiller Roundup causes the cancer known as non-Hodgkin’s lymphoma, a blow to efforts to bring class-action litigation there on the matter, even as the German company contends with thousands of similar claims in the US.】

item.title: 日本债券期货波动率升至今年最高点
item.description: 在日本央行下周召开政策会议之前，日本债券市场的不确定性达到了今年以来的最高水平。【原文：Uncertainty in Japan’s bond market is at the highest level this year ahead of the Bank of Japan’s policy meeting next week, where a reduction in its debt purchase program is widely expected.】

item.title: 华尔街重挫后英国市场下滑
item.description: 2024 年 1 月 3 日，星期三，英国伦敦金融城，伦敦证券交易所集团公司的标志。1984年1月3日推出的富时100指数是20世纪80年代改变伦敦金融城的众多创新之一。【原文：The logo of London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, Jan. 3, 2024. The FTSE 100, launched on Jan. 3, 1984, was one of many innovations that transformed the City of London in the 1980s.】

item.title: 日产因美国库存和销售疲软下调盈利预期
item.description: 日产汽车公司下调了全年运营利润目标，原因是日本销售疲软，而美国的高库存仍令人担忧。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. lowered its full-year operating profit target on weak sales in Japan, while a high inventory in the US remains a concern.】

item.title: 美国销售疲软导致 Stellantis 上半年盈利骤降
item.description: 今年上半年，Stellantis NV 的收益大幅下滑，公司承诺采取更多措施应对销售额的急剧下降。【原文：Stellantis NV’s earnings plunged in the first half of the year, with the company pledging additional measures to cope with a steep drop in sales.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛在清理 Benko 案件过程中客户资金流入加速
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）上半年的客户资金流入速度加快，这表明这家瑞士财富管理公司正开始走出去年 Signa 房地产丑闻引发的低谷。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. saw inflows of client funds accelerate in the first half, a sign that the Swiss wealth manager is starting to pull out of the slump induced by last year’s Signa real estate scandal.】

item.title: 马来西亚通胀风险因燃料补贴削减影响减弱而降低
item.description: 在六月份消费价格低于预期之后，马来西亚通货膨胀的风险正在减弱，而且人们对总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）将推迟削减该国最广泛使用的汽油补贴这一政治敏感举措的预期也在增长。【原文：Risks to Malaysia’s inflation are waning after June consumer prices undershot estimates and as expectations grow that Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim will delay a politically sensitive move to cut subsidies for the country’s most widely-used gasoline.】

item.title: Mankind Pharma 是巴拉特血清竞购的领跑者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Mankind Pharma Ltd. 正在成为收购 Bharat Serums & Vaccines Ltd. 的领跑者，目标公司的估值可能在 15 亿美元左右。【原文：Mankind Pharma Ltd. is emerging as the frontrunner to acquire Bharat Serums & Vaccines Ltd. in a deal that could value the target company at around $1.5 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 收益疲软引发评级下调，安信银行股价暴跌
item.description: 由于资产质量恶化和信贷成本上升，印度 Axis 银行第一季度盈利不及预期，该公司股价下跌。至少有五家券商下调了该股的评级。【原文：Axis Bank Ltd.’s shares declined after the Indian lender’s first-quarter earnings missed estimates on worsening asset quality and elevated credit costs. At least five brokerages downgraded the stock.】

item.title: 瑞银因 3.5 亿美元逃税案受到美国参议员质询
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）被一位有权势的美国立法者问及，其收购的银行瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）是否没有报告一名被控逃税 3.5 亿美元收入的美国人。【原文：UBS Group AG was asked by a powerful US lawmaker about whether the bank it acquired, Credit Suisse Group AG, failed to report an American accused of evading taxes on $350 million in income.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行（SocGen）和美国银行（BofA）称，挪威克朗汇率下跌趋势已经结束，是时候买入挪威克朗了
item.description: 随着挪威克朗接近一年多来的最弱水平，货币策略师和投资者正抓住这一机会，押注挪威克朗将从十国集团排名的末位攀升至首位。【原文：Currency strategists and investors are seizing on Norway’s krone as it approaches the weakest level in over a year, betting it will climb from near the bottom toward the top of the Group-of-10 ranking.】

item.title: 比特币、以太币下滑，避险情绪蔓延加密货币市场
item.description: 随着股市暴跌，全球市场的不安情绪蔓延，第二大代币以太币引领了数字资产的下跌。【原文：Ether, the second-largest token, paced a drop in digital assets following a slump in equities that spread unease in global markets.】

item.title: Ares 和大华银行为黑石办公楼再融资后出售被撤
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone Real Estate Partners LP 已从 Ares Management Corp. 和 United Overseas Bank Ltd. 获得一笔贷款，用于为悉尼一栋商业办公楼进行再融资。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone Real Estate Partners LP has received a loan from Ares Management Corp. and United Overseas Bank Ltd. to refinance an existing facility that funded a commercial office block in Sydney, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度对投机性交易的担忧日益强烈
铜价跌破 9000 美元门槛，金属跌势加剧
item.description: 铜价暴跌，自 4 月初以来首次跌破每吨 9,000 美元的门槛，原因是对全球尤其是中国的需求前景日益悲观。【原文：Copper tumbled — falling below the $9,000 a ton threshold for the first time since early April — on increasing pessimism on the global, and particularly the Chinese, demand outlook.】

item.title: 印度觊觎全球海鲜大蛋糕，虾类股票大涨
item.description: 本周，在印度政府宣布帮助当地水产养殖公司在不断增长的全球市场中占据更大份额的建议之后，虾农成为印度最热门的股票交易之一。【原文：Shrimp farmers have been among the hottest stock trades in India this week after the government announced proposals to help local aquaculture firms capture a bigger share of a growing global market.】

item.description: 拉塔姆航空集团（Latam Airlines Group SA）的一批股东通过首次公开发行美国存托股票筹集了 4.56 亿美元。【原文：A group of Latam Airlines Group SA shareholders raised $456 million in an initial public offering of American depositary shares.】

item.description: 随着人工智能推动的科技股涨势逆转，以及对日本央行准备加息的担忧加剧，日本日经 225 日经平均指数（Nikkei 225 Stock Average）将出现技术性修正。【原文：Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average headed for a technical correction as an AI-driven rally in technology shares went into reverse and concerns grew that the Bank of Japan is poised to hike interest rates.】

item.description: 在越来越多的人预期日本和美国之间的利率差距最终将缩小的情况下，日元拐点的迹象越来越明显。【原文：Signs of an inflection point for the yen are mounting amid growing expectations that the interest rate gap between Japan and the US is finally set to shrink.】

item.title: 中国意外下调一年期政策利率，降幅为 2020 年以来最大
item.description: 中国人民银行出人意料地将一年期政策性贷款利率下调了2020年4月以来的最大降幅，此前还意外下调了关键的短期利率，以提振放缓的经济活动。【原文：The People’s Bank of China unexpectedly lowered the rate on its one-year policy loans by the most since April 2020, following a surprise reduction to a key short-term rate to boost slowing economic activity.】
